title: Major train fault causing delays in the East West Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东西线主要列车故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan kereta api utama menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan Timur Barat
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் முக்கிய ரயில் கோளாறு

updates.text: [EWL] Update: Train services from #OutramPark towards #JooKoon are now operating normally.
[EWL] : Update Free bus service between OutramPark and Queenstown has ceased.
[EWL] CLEARED: Train services from #OutramPark towards #JooKoon are now operating normally.
[EWL] UPDATE: Train service from OutramPark to JooKoon has resumed service.
[EWL]:Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #OutramPark to #JooKoon due to train fault.We are working to recover the service.
[EWL]: Update Estimate 15mins additional travelling time from #OutramPark  to #JooKoon  due to train fault.
[EWL]: Estimate 20mins additional travelling time from #OutramPark  to #Joo Koon  due to train fault.
